tasks.task: Inquire about flow control valves for sprinkler systems.
subtasks: Assess current water pressure in sprinkler zones.
Determine necessity of flow control valves for optimal irrigation.

tasks.task: Install flow control valves in spray head zones.
subtasks: Measure water pressure in spray head zones.
Adjust water pressure to 30 psi for proper spray head function.

tasks.task: Install pop-up spray heads in spray head zones.
subtasks: Replace necessary rotor zones with spray head zones.

tasks.task: Align water pressure for both rotors and spray heads.
subtasks: Ensure rotors receive at least 50 psi for proper function.
Check spray heads operate effectively at adjusted pressure.

tasks.task: Obtain customer service assistance for irrigation questions.
subtasks: Utilize chat option on sprinklerwarehouse.com for support.

tasks.task: Visit the Sprinkler Warehouse website for educational resources.
subtasks: Explore videos about controlling water pressure.
Learn about usage of flow control valves, spray heads, and rotors.
